channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- EZ Media & Backup Center ix2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- EZ Media & Backup Center ix2

item.title: CVE-2019-19758|2024-08-05T02:25:12.624Z -- lenovo -- ez%20media%20%26%20backup%20center%20ix2
item.description: A vulnerability in the web interface of Lenovo EZ Media & Backup Center, ix2 & ix2-dl version 4.1.406.34763 and prior could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to redirect a user to an untrusted web page.
